titles.title: Imperial Valley College Barker Museum Land Transfer Act of 1988
Imperial Valley College Barker Museum Land Transfer Act of 1988
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain parcel of land located near Ocotillo, California.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs. Report No: 100-20.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston without amendment. With written report No. 100-180.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 343.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
House Agreed to Senate Amendment With an Amendment Pursuant to H.R.578.
Message on House action received in Senate and held at desk: House amendment to Senate amendment.

vote.text: Senate agreed to the House amendment to the Senate amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 10/6/1988--House agreed to Senate amendment with amendment. (House agreed to Senate amendment with amendment under suspension of rules) Imperial Valley College Barker Museum Land Transfer Act of 1988 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey, without consideration, specified land near Ocotillo, California, to Imperial Valley College Barker Museum of El Centro, California, for museum purposes.
